description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长、外交部新闻发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Information Department and Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 毛宁的父亲，曾任湘潭大学教授。
description.en: Mao Ning's father, a former professor at Xiangtan University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的开国领袖。其父毛贻昌与毛宁之父毛贻发同属贻字辈，为堂兄弟关系。
description.en: The founding father of the People's Republic of China. His father, Mao Yichang, and Mao Ning's father, Mao Yifa, belong to the same 'Yi' generation, indicating they were paternal cousins.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的父亲，与毛宁之父毛贻发同属贻字辈。
description.en: Mao Zedong's father, who belongs to the same 'Yi' generation as Mao Ning's father, Mao Yifa.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司
en: Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责发布中国重要外交活动信息、阐述中国对外政策等。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, responsible for releasing information on China's major diplomatic activities and explaining China's foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家、外交官，担任外交部部长，是毛宁的上级。
description.en: A Chinese politician and diplomat who serves as the Minister of Foreign Affairs and is Mao Ning's superior.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，毛宁的前任外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and Mao Ning's predecessor as Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人
en: Spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的官方发言人职位。
description.en: The official spokesperson position for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南省长沙市的一所师范大学。
description.en: A normal university located in Changsha, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部所属的唯一一所培养外交外事、国际问题研究和涉外经济、法律人才的高等院校。
description.en: The only institution of higher learning under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China for training diplomatic, foreign affairs, and international studies personnel.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国首都华盛顿特区的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Washington, D.C., the capital of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省曾存在的地区，毛宁的出生地。
description.en: A former prefecture in Hunan Province, Mao Ning's birthplace.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南省湘潭市的综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Xiangtan, Hunan Province.

en: Department of Asian Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责处理亚洲地区相关外交事务。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, responsible for handling diplomatic affairs related to the Asian region.

nodes.id: 中日韩三国合作秘书处

zh-cn: 中日韩三国合作秘书处

description.zh-cn: 旨在促进中国、日本和韩国之间和平与共同繁荣的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization aimed at promoting peace and common prosperity among China, Japan, and South Korea.

en: Embassy of the People's Republic of China in the United States

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在美国设立的外交代表机构。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the People's Republic of China in the United States.

en: Leshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在乐山市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Leshan City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省乐山市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Leshan City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，时任外交部新闻司副司长，为毛宁的副手。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat, serving as a deputy director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and as Mao Ning's deputy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，时任外交部新闻司副司长及外交部发言人。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat, serving as a deputy director of the Information Department and a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，时任外交部新闻司副司长及外交部发言人。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat, serving as a deputy director of the Information Department and a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，时任外交部新闻司副司长，为毛宁的副手。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat, serving as a deputy director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and as Mao Ning's deputy.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府负责外交事务的组成部门。
description.en: The executive agency of the government of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 2025年1月15日，毛宁升任外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: On January 15, 2025, Mao Ning was promoted to Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 2022年9月5日，毛宁出任外交部新闻司副司长。
description.en: On September 5, 2022, Mao Ning took office as the Deputy Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 毛宁在外交部任职，王毅为其上级领导外交部长。
description.en: Mao Ning works in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, with Wang Yi as her superior, the Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 毛宁接替华春莹出任外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Mao Ning succeeded Hua Chunying as the Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

description.zh-cn: 毛宁于2022年9月5日作为第33任新闻发言人首次亮相。
description.en: Mao Ning debuted as the 33rd spokesperson on September 5, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 毛宁是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Mao Ning is a member of the Communist Party of China.

degree.en: Bachelor's degree in English, Department of Foreign Languages

degree.zh-cn: 外交学专业第二学士学位

description.zh-cn: 两人同属贻字辈，为堂兄弟关系。
description.en: The two belong to the same 'Yi' generation, indicating they were paternal cousins.

position.zh-cn: 科员、副处长、办公室主任、副司长等
position.en: Staff Member, Deputy Division Director, Office Director, Deputy Director-General, etc.

relationships.target: 中日韩三国合作秘书处

description.zh-cn: 在毛宁担任外交部新闻司司长期间，蒋小燕为其副手。
description.en: While Mao Ning serves as Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Jiang Xiaoyan is her deputy.

description.zh-cn: 在毛宁担任外交部新闻司司长期间，林剑为其副手。
description.en: While Mao Ning serves as Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Lin Jian is her deputy.

description.zh-cn: 在毛宁担任外交部新闻司司长期间，郭嘉昆为其副手。
description.en: While Mao Ning serves as Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Guo Jiakun is her deputy.

description.zh-cn: 在毛宁担任外交部新闻司司长期间，钱进为其副手。
description.en: While Mao Ning serves as Director of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Qian Jin is her deputy.
